name: Pinky - Find differences
description:
In this game we have collected the most nice photos.

Find a seven differences in the pictures with penguins, parrots, lemurs and other animals and pets. There is also pictures of child, kitties and puppies here :) You can play any picture you want any time. Use Zoom and Hint to spot hardest differences and make game cosy.

Train your attention with pleasure with best Find differences game series ever!
